name: Kanye
line: Oh, OK, dope, You still got the Nashville number.

name: Interviewer
line: I still have the Nashville um, area code but I had to change it.

name: Kanye
line: For all my Southside as that know me best, I feel like me and Taylor might still have sex.

name: Interviewer
line: I'm like, this close to overexposure.

name: Kanye
line: Oh, well, this one is .. I think this is a really cool thing to have.

name: Interviewer
line: I know, I mean it's like a compliment, kind of.

name: Kanye
line: What I give a f-k is about is just you as a person, and as a friend.

name: Kanye
line: I want things that make you feel good. I don't wanna do rap that makes people feel bad.

name: Interviewer
line: Um, yeah, I mean go with whatever line you think is better. It's obviously very tongue-in-cheek either way. .. And I really appreciate you telling me about it, that's really nice.

name: Kanye
line: Yeah, I just have a responsibility to you as a friend. .. Thanks for being so cool about it.

name: Interviewer
line: Well, thanks, yeah. I really appreciate it. The head's up is so nice. .. Even asking or seeing if I'd be OK with it. I just really appreciate it. I never would have expected you to, like, tell me about one of the lines in your song.

name: Interviewer
line: And the flowers that you sent me,  I Instagrammed a picture of them, and it's the most Instagram likes I've ever gotten. It was like 2.7.

name: Kanye
line: Relationships are more important than punch lines, you know?
